featured.text: Rather it is PBS, Public Broadcasting System, a non-profit public broadcasting TV service.
In 2011, they were voted as one of the world’s top five performance groups by audiences of Japan Broadcasting Corporation’s Amazing Voice program.

definition.zh_def: 廣播，指通過無線電、電視或互聯網等媒介傳送音頻或視頻內容的行為。
definition.en_def: The transmission of audio or video content to a wide audience via radio, television, or the internet.
definition.example: The broadcasting of the concert reached millions of viewers around the world.
